topic.title: ED Cause Of Injury Observation - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:20)/@code="11373-8" Injury cause (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:19)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:21), which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.3.1 ICD-10) (CONF:22)
NEMSIS Trace: eOutcome.08 - Emergency Department Recorded Cause of Injury

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship {subsets Observation::entryRelationship}, where its type is ED Context Reference Entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] ED Context Reference Entry
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] templateId1 with @xsi:type="II"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:20)/@code="11373-8" Injury cause (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:19)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] value with @xsi:type="CD" (CONF:21), which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.3.1 ICD-10) (CONF:22)
NEMSIS Trace: eOutcome.08 - Emergency Department Recorded Cause of Injury
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] templateId1 with @xsi:type="II"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship {subsets Observation::entryRelationship}, where its type is ED Context Reference Entry
Contains exactly one [1..1] ED Context Reference Entry
